name: C4JExplorer
short_description: The C4J-Explorer plug-in for Eclipse facilitates the use of Design by Contract in the development process by automating the creation and synchronization of types and their contracts. It works in combination with the DbC framework C4J (Contracts for Java).

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 3.0 (GPLv3)

Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Testers
